result.title: Enhancing Deep learning/reinforcement learning
result.description: The deliverable will initially detail the Big Data and ML framework that enables MLaaS and supports decentralised federated ML Then it studies different deep ML andor reinforcement learning techniques including selflearning techniques and supervisedunsupervised learning procedures applied to IoT devices to select those that better fit the IoTNGIN scenarios and enhance the ML models performance
